amendment.description: An amendment to provide funding for hydrogen research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numberd 27 printed in the Congressional Record to provide funding for hydrogen research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wynn amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
